Once again I'm sick of people at school thinking I'm
gay.  I was having sexual fantasies about the Pink and
Yellow Power Rangers, when everyone else was thinking
about being the Red Ranger.  And I have an IQ of 150. 
Please don't shove it down my throat if yours is
higher, I'm just telling you I'm not an idiot.  And
while I sometimes sound rude I said that simply
pointing out "long live" is the general expression. 
Actually "long life" may be nice for a change, but
"long live so-and-so is all I've ever heard said.  I'm
not taking a shot at airly, if I made a mistake like
that in Spanish I'd want him to tell me.

--- Hollywood Narrator
<hollywood.narrator@...> wrote:
> OOC: Yes, I agree, Lurker, everything you said was
> correct, as usual, but we have to realize that
> Dewboy is only an idiot. He can't help it. We have
> to be nicer to idiots, because they often don't
> understand words like "long" or "life." It's our
> responsibility to be patient and understanding, and
> be a little more gentle to all of the rude idiots by
> showing that we care. I.E.: Dewboy, please don't be
> a stupid faggot. Please learn basic English and stop
> taking shots at Airly for no reason. While you're at
> it, please stop being a dick. Thanks!
> 
> The preceding message was paid for by the neW WorLD
> orDer. Failure to respect will earn you no respect
> in return.
> 
> 4 Life
